title: Question on swains arm?
body: Is it part of a demon? Was it grown using demon blood? How does this give swain a demons power? Are demons usually powerful? Just gener knowledge on swains demon arm and the demon it came from as well as just general information on demons.

replies.body:
Swain's writer here. The arm itself is made of pure demonic magic, the same thing he shoots with his Q. It's held together by Swain's force of will and concentration. If you look closely, you'll see there's some opacity to it; it's not solid or grown. 

The demonic magic, as a whole, holds Swain together, and helps him overcome the grievous wounds he suffered in Ionia. He has a leg brace and still carries a cane (i.e., has one on hand, just in case), because even a bad ass like Swain knows he can't concentrate 100% of the time. He is the type of man to prepare for contingencies. 

The demon is a demon of secrets. It's why Swain hears whispers when he collects souls, and why he's haunted by visions of a dark future. Saying anything more is kind of against demon of secrets policy. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

(Sleight edit for clarity above.)

I was referring to when Mordekaiser's VGU drops. 
{{champion:69}} {{champion:8}} tend to get neglected whenever Noxus gets new or more lore, so I was making a (light hearted, honest.) joke that Swain, Darius, Le Blanc et all would get expansions on their lore with Morde's update... but not Vlad or Cass.

Meanwhile our boy {{champion:91}} has been left ignored by all the big updates on Noxus. Wonder if Riot has any special plans for him.
At least Cassio got a brief mention about her return to Noxus after the "Shuriman affair" and Vlad has received a story update that puts him in a very specifical spot.

Personally, I doubt any Noxian champ will see more lore with Morde's own. Although LeBlanc, Vlad, Veigar and Swain's demon were all around when he was still occupying Valoran. So if any other champ was, it would be no surprise if one of them had a mention or something. Yet I doubt even then, those champs will probably get VO references instead of further lore.
